## Live Simulation

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: true

# Monte Carlo simulation example
n_sims <- 1000
results <- replicate(n_sims, {
  sample_data <- rnorm(50, mean = 100, sd = 15)
  mean(sample_data)
})

cat("Simulation Results:\n")
cat("Mean:", round(mean(results), 2), "\n")
cat("SD:", round(sd(results), 2), "\n")
cat("95% CI: [", round(quantile(results, 0.025), 2), 
    ",", round(quantile(results, 0.975), 2), "]")
```
